q: Carmelo Anthony and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. He got going early, leaLeBron James out on the fast break and getting easy layups. He then moved to the outside, going 4-for-8 from 3-point range. He got a couple of easy ones, and once you get a couple of layups, the basket looks bigger, said Allen Iverson , who had 28 points.`` He played a great game, and hopefully he can continue to play that way.'' Linas Kleiza scored 27 points in the first half, 20 in the second quarter

Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said.`` These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web,'' he said.
